Text: Thanks for this! My first up to date One Piece episode... I don't know if I can keep watching it like this. One episode a week isn't nearly enough!
i have full episodes of one piece. wohooo!
@Ravenicus: Haha, I don't watch for weeks just so I can have a couple episodes to watch back to back.

First of all great job on the torrent :) We really appreciate it. Second, the opening theme is a bit off... When the guy says ich, ni, sunshine, yon, we go! and it's translated One, two, three, sunshine, four, we go. Yon is actually five and sunshine is actually a clever thingamabob for sun shi (three four). anyway that's it!
